headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About AvalonBay (AVB) Q1 Earnings
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for AvalonBay (AVB) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: AvalonBay Communities (AVB) Q1 FFO Surpass Estimates
summary: AvalonBay (AVB) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 1.07% and 0.19%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: AvalonBay: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ARLINGTON, Va. (AP) — AvalonBay Communities Inc. (AVB) on Wednesday reported a key measure of profitability in its first quarter.  The results beat Wall Street expectations.  The real estate investment trust, based in Arlington, Virginia, said it had funds from operations of $403.3 million, or $2.83 per share, in the period.

headline: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. Provides Q1 2025 Results, Q2 2025 Guidance, and Reaffirms Full Year 2025 Outlook
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., April 30, 2025--AvalonBay Communities, Inc. (NYSE: AVB) (the "Company") reported Earnings per Share – diluted ("EPS"), Funds from Operations attributable to common stockholders - diluted ("FFO") per share and Core FFO per share (as defined in this release) for the three months ended March 31, 2025 and 2024 as detailed below.
